Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Gangrenous \Gan"gre*nous\, a. [Cf. F. gangr['e]neux.] Affected by, or produced by, gangrene; of the nature of gangrene. [1913 Webster]
gangrenous adj : suffering from tissue death [syn: {mortified}]
